items.name: Name Tag
items.item_description: This item will rename a weapon. A custom engraved nameplate will be applied to the weapon and viewable in game.

items.name: casket
items.item_description: The Storage Unit allows you to store up to 1,000 of your surplus items which would otherwise exceed inventory limit. At any time you can move items from your inventory into the Storage Unit, retrieve items back into your inventory, or you can just use it to organize your collectibles.

items.name: Weapon Case Key
items.item_description: This key will open any Valve Series Weapon Case. Non-Valve Series cases (e.g. The eSports Weapon Case) require their own key to open.

items.name: E-Sports Weapon Case Key 1
items.item_description: This key opens any eSports Case.\n\nA portion of the proceeds from the sale of this key will go towards one of the established community-run CS:GO tournaments. Stay tuned for further announcements.

items.name: Sticker Crate Key
items.item_description: This key will open any Valve Series Capsule.

items.name: Community Case Key 1
items.item_description: This key only opens Winter Offensive Cases

items.name: Community Case Key 2
items.item_description: This key only opens Operation Phoenix Cases

items.name: Community Case Key 3 June 2014
items.item_description: This key only opens Huntsman Cases

items.name: Community Sticker Capsule 1 Key June 2014
items.item_description: This key opens the Community Sticker Capsule 1.\n\nA portion of the proceeds from the sale of this key will go to the sticker creators.

items.name: Community Case Key 4
items.item_description: This key only opens Operation Breakout Cases

items.name: Community Case Key 5
items.item_description: This key only opens Operation Vanguard Cases

items.name: Community Case Key 6
items.item_description: This key only opens Chroma Cases

items.name: Community Case Key 7
items.item_description: This key only opens Chroma 2 Cases

items.name: Falchion Case Key
items.item_description: This key only opens Falchion Cases

items.name: Community Case Key 9
items.item_description: This key only opens Shadow Cases

items.name: crate_community_10 Key
items.item_description: This key only opens Revolver Cases

items.name: Game License
items.item_description: This is a purchased game license for Counter-Strike: Global Offensive

items.name: XpShopTicket1
items.item_description: Activating this Armory Pass will immediately allow you to start earning Armory Credits. For each active Armory Pass you will unlock 40 total Armory Credits by playing and earning XP.

items.name: Remove Keychain Tool Pack
items.item_description: Charm Detachment Pack will give you 3 Charm Detachments. Each Charm Detachment allows you to detach one applied charm. The detached charm will appear in your inventory.

items.name: crate_stattrak_swap_tool
items.item_description: This item contains two StatTrak™ Swap Tools. A StatTrak™ Swap Tool swaps StatTrak™ values between two of the same item type.

items.name: community_11 Key
items.item_description: This key only opens Operation Wildfire Cases

items.name: tournament_pass_sha2024_charge
items.item_description: This is a sealed Perfect World Shanghai 2024 CS2 Major Championship Souvenir Package.

items.name: crate_sticker_pack_sha2024_legends
items.item_description:
This capsule contains a single Shanghai 2024 Legends participant Paper, Glitter, Holo, or Gold sticker.

50% of the proceeds from the sale of this capsule support the included organizations.

That sticker can be applied to any weapon you own and can be scraped to look more worn. You can scrape the same sticker multiple times, making it a bit more worn each time, until it is removed from the weapon.

items.name: crate_sticker_pack_sha2024_challengers
items.item_description:
This capsule contains a single Shanghai 2024 Challengers participant Paper, Glitter, Holo, or Gold sticker.

50% of the proceeds from the sale of this capsule support the included organizations.

That sticker can be applied to any weapon you own and can be scraped to look more worn. You can scrape the same sticker multiple times, making it a bit more worn each time, until it is removed from the weapon.

items.name: crate_sticker_pack_sha2024_contenders
items.item_description:
This capsule contains a single Shanghai 2024 Contenders participant Paper, Glitter, Holo, or Gold sticker.

50% of the proceeds from the sale of this capsule support the included organizations.

That sticker can be applied to any weapon you own and can be scraped to look more worn. You can scrape the same sticker multiple times, making it a bit more worn each time, until it is removed from the weapon.

items.name: crate_signature_pack_sha2024_group_legends
items.item_description:
This capsule contains a single Paper, Glitter, Holo, or Gold sticker autographed by one of the Legends players at Shanghai 2024.

50% of the proceeds from the sale of this capsule support the included players and organizations.

That sticker can be applied to any weapon you own and can be scraped to look more worn. You can scrape the same sticker multiple times, making it a bit more worn each time, until it is removed from the weapon.

That sticker can be applied to any weapon you own and can be scraped to look more worn. You can scrape the same sticker multiple times, making it a bit more worn each time, until it is removed from the weapon.
